title: The Crown
summary: The political and personal events of Queen Elizabeth II's reign, from her early years on the throne to the present day.

title: Chernobyl
summary: The story of the Chernobyl nuclear disaster and the efforts of the people who tried to mitigate its devastating effects.

title: Downton Abbey
summary: The lives of the aristocratic Crawley family and their servants in the early 20th century, exploring societal changes and personal drama.

title: Vikings
summary: The legendary Norse hero Ragnar Lothbrok rises to power through a mix of adventure, conquest, and familial conflict.

title: The Tudors
summary: The dramatic and tumultuous reign of King Henry VIII, focusing on his marriages and the political upheavals of his court.

title: 12 Years a Slave
summary: Based on the true story of Solomon Northup, a free black man who was kidnapped and sold into slavery, facing years of hardship.

title: The Last Kingdom
summary: In 9th-century England, a Saxon nobleman is torn between loyalty to his family and his Viking heritage.

title: Band of Brothers
summary: A World War II miniseries that follows Easy Company, a unit of the 506th Parachute Infantry Regiment of the 101st Airborne Division.

title: Lincoln
summary: A portrayal of Abraham Lincolnâ€™s life during his final months in office and his efforts to end the Civil War and abolish slavery.

title: The People v. O. J. Simpson: American Crime Story
summary: The story of the infamous O.J. Simpson trial, exploring the events and the media frenzy that surrounded the case.

title: Outlander
summary: A World War II nurse is mysteriously transported back in time to 18th-century Scotland, where she becomes entangled in historical events and romance.

title: Poldark
summary: The story of Ross Poldark, a British soldier returning home after the American Revolution to find his estate in ruins and his love lost.

title: Victoria
summary: The early life of Queen Victoria, from her ascension to the throne to her marriage to Prince Albert, exploring political challenges and personal relationships.

title: The Man in the High Castle
summary: In an alternate history where the Axis powers won World War II, various factions battle for control over the U.S.

title: Ripper Street
summary: Set in Victorian-era London, this drama follows a group of detectives as they attempt to solve crimes while dealing with the aftermath of Jack the Ripper.
